MC 5312 Online Media Design: Schedule

Fall 2017, Th 6:30 - 9:20pm, Media Innovation Lab

Date Description Due
Th 8/31 Introduction to the Internet Watch The True Story of the Internet: People
Read A Declaration of the Independence of Cyberspace
Th 9/7 Introduction to HTML Sign up for Reclaim Hosting
Read HTML Dog Beginner HTML Tutorials, Getting Started through Putting It All Together, HTML Doctor: Let’s Talk About Semantics
Th 9/14 Introduction to CSS Project 1: Personal Site (Phase 1)
Read HTML Dog CSS Tutorials, all beginner tutorials, Class and ID Slelectors, Grouping and Nesting, Specificity and Display
Watch Chrome DevTools - Elements Panel
Th 9/21 Introduction to Design Project 1: Personal Site (Phase 2)
Read IDEO Field Guide to Human-Centered Design, pages 9-25, Top 10 Principles of Effective Web Design, Principles of Interaction Design, Ten Principles of Inclusive Web Design
Th 9/28 User Research Read UX Research Cheat Sheet
Read IDEO Field Guide to Human-Centered Design, pages 29-127 (Skim this but pick several methods to focus on.)
Th 10/5 Design Project  
Th 10/12 CSS Frameworks User Research Project
Complete code_cademy Bootstrap Tutorial
Read Discussing the Pros and Cons of Using a CSS Framework
Look over Bootstrap CSS Documentation and Bootstrap Components Documentation
Th 10/19 Responsive Design Read Pew Research Center Mobile Fact Sheet, Guidelines to Building a Responsive Web Design
Th 10/26 Multimedia Project 2: Organization Site
Th 11/2 Multimedia Journalism Read Transcoding the news, A Game of Shark and Minnow
Th 11/9 Content Management Systems Watch An Introduction to Wordpress
Install Wordpress on your server
Th 11/16 Content Management Systems Read: COPE: Create Once, Publish Everywhere, Battle for the Body Field
Watch Content in a Zombie Apocalypse
Th 11/23 NO CLASS  
Th 11/30 Work Day  
Th 12/7 Presentations Project 3: Multimedia Journalism Project
Read Nieman Lab: Predictions for Journalism, 2017 (Pick a few related to course content to focus on.)
